name: GT Car Traffic VR
description:
GT Car Traffic VR is one of the best VR racing games. Have fun dodging traffic cars while you speed up to the limit. Game has enormous features which will increase you level of interest and excitement. On your way up you will have to collect coins to score maximum. There will boost packs also placed randomly on the road which will lead your car speed to super sonic speed.
Features:
- Fastest Sports Car.
- Endless highway road with traffic cars;
- Dynamic change in Environment;
- Realistic car physics;
- View from cockpit of the car.
